title: LinkedIn Content Automation
description: Automated LinkedIn content generation pipeline. Fetches news from RSS feeds, filters for relevance, generates high-signal posts using AI, and manages an approval workflow via Telegram before posting.

title: Community Messages
description: Crypto community engagement bot. Monitors multiple crypto news sources, filters for high-impact updates, and broadcasts summaries to Telegram communities. Includes rate limiting and duplicate detection.

title: X Content Automation - Crypto
description: High-frequency X (Twitter) bot for crypto analysis. Ingests market news, uses AI to identify key narratives, and generates sharp, high-signal tweets. Features memory buffers to avoid repetition.

title: AI Facebook Ad Spy Tool
description: Automated Facebook Ad Library scraper and analyzer. Fetches competitor ads, downloads media, uses Gemini 1.5 Pro to analyze visuals and video content, and saves structured insights to Google Sheets.

title: Email Inbox Manager
description: Intelligent email classification and drafting system. Categorizes incoming Gmail messages (Internal, Support, Promotions), uses OpenAI to draft context-aware responses, and notifies Slack for high-priority items.

title: Firecrawl Search
description: Advanced web search agent using Firecrawl. Converts natural language queries into complex search operators, scrapes full-page content, and returns structured markdown results for research or monitoring.

title: HeyGen Avatar
description: Automated video generation pipeline. Scrapes news content, generates a concise script using AI, and produces a professional avatar video using HeyGen's API.

title: LinkedIn Comment Scraper
description: Viral post lead generation system. Scrapes LinkedIn comments, enriches profiles with company data, qualifies leads based on industry/size, and drafts personalized DM outreach scripts.

title: Live Search Grok API
description: Real-time X (Twitter) intelligence agent. Uses Grok API to monitor tech leaders, breaking news, and viral trends, providing balanced summaries and citations from live social data.

title: Pre-meeting Prep - Calendly
description: Automated meeting preparation agent. Triggers on Calendly bookings, researches attendees and companies using Perplexity AI, analyzes meeting goals, and emails a comprehensive briefing with an audio summary.

title: Ultimate Browser Agent
description: Comprehensive browser automation suite for ad intelligence. An advanced version of the Ad Spy tool with enhanced error handling, multi-format media processing, and deeper analysis capabilities.

title: iMessage Automation
description: SMS/iMessage automation bridge. Receives messages via webhook, uses an AI agent with memory to generate context-aware replies, and sends responses back via Twilio.
